templates.name: Do you offer replating serives?
templates.content:
Since our jewelry is plated, we recommend avoiding contact with lotion, perfume, make-up, and/or any harsh cleaning products. Remove your jewelry before showering, swimming, exercising, or washing your hands. To clean or polish, use a soft, dry tissue to gently remove any debris.

Once the plating has begun to break down and the piece has lost its shine there is no way of bringing that back. Please note, that we do not offer re-plating services.

templates.name: Damaged/broken/missing items - Brand specific
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customercare@julievos.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What happened to your Cassis collection
templates.content: Our Cassis collection was renamed to Cannes collection.

templates.name: Do you have a physical catalog?
templates.content: You may request our latest catalog and be added to our mailing list on this link: https://www.julievos.com/pages/request-a-catalog

templates.name: Earring Size Guide
templates.content: You may view the Earring Size Guide here: https://julievos.attn.tv/aKf3ZiUOKcYM

templates.name: Do you accept PayPal?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't currently accept PayPal as a payment method.

templates.name: Do you have clip-on earrings?
templates.content: Yes, we do offer clip-on earrings and you can check them out here: https://www.julievos.com/collections/clip-ons

templates.name: Is it real chalcedony wherever it says "chalcedony blue"?
templates.content: Chalcedony Blue or Iridescent Chalcedony Blue is not a semi-precious stone but rather a colored glass. With our iridescent stones, it means that the colored glass is layered over a mother of pearl which creates a beautiful, luminous effect.

templates.name: How do I sign up to receive the birthday code?
templates.content: You will be sent the birthday coupon by signing up for our email newsletters and it will be sent on the day of your birthday. Here is the link to sign up which enrolls you in our email & text marketing: https://julievos.attn.tv/sl/I4ceKIbK

templates.name: Do you have any engagement rings?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't make engagement rings.

templates.name: Size question for Hinged Bangles (EDIT the "XX" BEFORE SENDING THE TEMP!)
templates.content: All of our Hinged Bangles are hinged to fit most wrists. The xx Bangle measures approximately xx in diameter for reference.

templates.name: What are sample sale items?
templates.content: The sample sale items are simply pieces of jewelry from previous seasons that have been marked down to make room for new jewelry in upcoming seasons.

templates.name: What is the vault collection?
templates.content: The Vault is a small collection of new colors or styles of jewels that were never released and therefore extremely limited-edition, as well as limited quantity and sizes available. Once they are gone, they will be sold out for good.

templates.name: How do I open the Monaco Hinge Bangle?
templates.content:
The video on this page helps immensely:
https://www.julievos.com/products/monaco-hinge-bangle?utm_campaign=concierge&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=77pZ5 There's a hidden release; all you need to do is gently press one side near the opening (on the Monaco Hinge bangle, it's on the side that has the braided trim detail) while simultaneously gently pulling the other side apart like you normally would.

templates.name: How should I clean my jewelry?
templates.content: To clean or polish your jewlery, use a soft, dry tissue to gently remove any debris.

templates.name: Does the jewelry come in a box?
templates.content: Your jewels will be shipped in a deluxe Julie Vos box, with our signature micro-suede pouch.

templates.name: Can I add a gift note?
templates.content: Should you like to include a gift note, it will be printed on the recipient's gift invoice. To add the note click the link in your cart that says "Add a Note" and write your message.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on all domestic orders!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can sign up for our affiliate program here: https://join.collabs.shopify.com/community/apply/mBWqBjKw0r0

templates.name: Does your jewelry tarnish?
templates.content: Our jewelry is sealed to prevent tarnish.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customercare@julievos.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Sizing - bangles
templates.content: Happy to help! Our bangles are available in different sizes and finishes. You can find our measurements for each size here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#size-guide If you're still unsure, just let me know!

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/julievos/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/julievos

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We are carried in fine boutiques and in jewelry stores throughout the U.S.A. To find a store near you, please email us at customercare@julievos.com or give us a call at (646)448-4345. One of my colleagues will be more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Will you have a deal/sale on your Cassis/Cannes or Catalina collection?
templates.content: I'm afraid that products from the Cannes and Catalina collection are part of our signature collections and aren't offered at a discounted price.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#returns-exchanges Please note that all jewelry purchased from the sale is final sale. Final sale items may not be returned or exchanged.

templates.name: Will exclusive jewelry drops be available to your retailers / in-store?
templates.content: Our exclusive jewelry drops are actually only available online through julievos.com in limited quantities!

templates.name: Is the heather color in the lavender family?
templates.content: Yes, it's in the lavender family. It is a (light) purple-grey tone.

templates.name: Is there a larger link bracelet?
templates.content: Absolutely, that is our Cannes Demi Link Bracelet which can be found here: https://www.julievos.com/products/cannes-demi-link-bracelet?variant=31844826447970

templates.name: Do you have the Cassis iridescent slate blue ring?
templates.content: Please note that the Cassis collection was renamed to Cannes collection. We no longer sell the Slate Blue, but the Charcoal Blue is very similar: https://www.julievos.com/products/cannes-statement-ring?variant=40222136008802

templates.name: How do I maintain the jewelry?
templates.content: To maintain the jewelry, avoid getting the jewelry wet or in contact with chemicals such as lotion, perfume, etc. For more information, please read our care tips here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#jewelry-care-warranty-policy

templates.name: I'm looking for a great bridesmaids gift!
templates.content: That's wonderful! We have great bridesmaids gifts ideas in our bridal collection here: https://www.julievos.com/collections/bridal

templates.name: Is the site secure?
templates.content: Please rest assured that your personal information is safe and is never shared.

templates.name: How do I make my chain shorter?
templates.content: The necklace bale is large enough to stick through and loop again. For clarity, a video example demonstrating this can be found on our Mykonos Pendant here: https://www.julievos.com/products/mykonos-pendant

templates.name: I want to get something I saw from your physical catalog/mailer
templates.content: I'd highly recommend checking out our digital catalog so that you're more easily able to browse and shop our site directly as well: https://www.julievos.com/pages/catalog?page=1

templates.name: Do you offer warranty for items purchased through a third party vendor/retailer?
templates.content: I'm afraid items purchased through a third-party vendor (outside of JulieVos.com and/or our from one of our authorized retailers) will not be covered. Please direct your request to the location the items were purchased from.

templates.name: Can the metal be heated & stretched?
templates.content: The metal can not be heated and stretched and we do not recommend altering the jewelry.

templates.name: How should I store my jewelry?
templates.content: You should store your jewelry in the microfiber suede pouch included with your purchase.

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#jewelry-care-warranty-policy

templates.name: Is your jewelry gold plated?
templates.content: Our jewelry is hand set in 24k gold plate over nickel-free brass.

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: Our jewelry is designed in New York City and we partner with select manufacturers around the world.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via UPS. Once shipped, it will take 3-7 business days for domestic orders, and 14-21 business days for international orders.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to reach out our wholesale team directly. They can be reached Monday through Friday from 9 am to 5 pm EST via email at wholesale@julievos.com, and their direct line is 646-448-4169.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I'm afraid we are unable to make any changes to an order once it has been placed. I can check if it's possible to cancel. Can I have the order number and email address?

templates.name: Can you recommend bangles that would go well with the Colette?
templates.content: The Colette bangle can be paired with a lot since it's a thin gold bangle. But we love to coordinate the beaded detail with at least one other bangle with similar details of a thicker dimension, like the Marbella bangle, and the Milano bangle in any color to add a pop! If you want more neutral/gold, the SoHo Stacking Bangle and Bee Bangle are also a popular trio of bangles!

templates.name: Do the pendants come with the chains?
templates.content: All pendants mean pendant necklaces, meaning that the chains are included. The total length of our pendant necklaces (chains included) can be found in the Details area under the product description, both the chain length and pendant dimensions are listed.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (646)448-4345 Monday-Friday from 9:30am to 5pm or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Do you have bracelet sets?
templates.content: We unfortunately no longer carry the bracelet sets. Some of the favorites we love to pair together are styled here: https://www.julievos.com/collections/stacked-to-perfection All of our jewelry comes packaged in luxury gift boxes, but if you'd like them to be packaged as a set, please call (646)448-4345 or email customercare@julievos.com so one of our reps can communicate that to our fulfillment team before the package ships! If you want more styling/pairing ideas, feel free to browse our digital catalog here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/catalog

templates.name: Can I use the code from my catalog online?
templates.content: The codes on our catalog are only valid on our online store, so yes, you can use it!

templates.name: Is your jewelry signed/stamped with your logo?
templates.content: We have our signature JV logo on most of our pieces. An example of the JV logo can be seen on our Catalina Bangle here: https://julievos.attn.tv/sl/x4ZpjY4W

templates.name: Weekend escalation template
templates.content: Just to set proper expectations, our in-house team will help and reply back when they're in-office Monday-Friday during regular business hours. I appreciate your patience!

templates.name: Are returns free?
templates.content: Yes, our returns are free, there is no fee for using our label to send it back! :)

templates.name: Can I return online if I purchased in a store?
templates.content: No, in this case, you'd need to return it directly to the store where you purchased it.

templates.name: Do you have extenders?
templates.content: At this time, we do not offer extenders for linked toggle bracelets or necklaces. We will pass along your feedback to the appropriate team for consideration in the future!

templates.name: Do the sample sale products come in a box?
templates.content: The sample sale products don't come in a gift box, just a micro-suede pouch. However, the universal gift boxes are available for purchase separately here: https://www.julievos.com/products/gift-box

templates.name: What's the difference between the Pacific Blue and the Chalcedony Blue?
templates.content: Our Pacific Blue is a much brighter blue as indicated in our photos, whereas, the Chalcedony Blue is closer to a baby blue.

templates.name: How do I open my hinge bangle?
templates.content:
Hinge bangles could be a little tricky to open. We have this video on one of our product pages that shows how to open it: https://julievos.attn.tv/sl/2dhOCZEF

As shown in the video, you are going to find the side opposite the hinge and locate the raised gold detail (which can be located on all gold-hinged styles). It looks like this, once found light press down while pulling open! https://julievos.attn.tv/sl/jK5SPtZ2

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We're located in New York City and process orders on weekdays, Monday-Friday (excluding holidays).

templates.name: Where's the closest retailer that sells XX?
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customercare@julievos.com or call 646-448-4345. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: When will you restock the Monogram Pendant letters?
templates.content: Our team has listened to customer feedback and will be restocking select letters of the Monogram Pendant style. They will be available in January 2024. When they are back in stock, we will send out an SMS to let our subscribers know first!

templates.name: Do you offer repairs?
templates.content: We do not offer repairs. However, for 12 months from the date of purchase, we are happy to take care of your product if damage to the material occurs. For more information please take a look at our warranty policy here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#jewelry-care-warranty-policy

templates.name: I lost the other piece of my earrings. Can I get a replacement? / Do you sell one earring?
templates.content: Sorry to hear that! Unfortunately, we don't offer separate/spare replacement pieces of earrings. I really appreciate your patience and understanding on this!

templates.name: What is the value of the birthday code?
templates.content: The birthday coupon is $50 off of $200+ purchase before taxes.

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.julievos.com/pages/faqs#size-guide

templates.name: Size of the Hinged bracelet/bangle
templates.content: All of our Hinged have an 8-inch circumference and 2.5-inch diameter.

templates.name: Ring Size
templates.content: We have a variety of ring sizes from S/M to 9! Check out this link to find a size that's perfect for you https://www.julievos.com/collections/rings?sort_by=manual

templates.name: Can I use your codes at the store?
templates.content:
Any discount code or promotional code you may have received from us is only valid towards purchases on our website at JulieVos.com. It cannot be used at retail stores, as we do not operate brick-and-mortar locations. Our retail partners that carry our pieces do not honor these discounts and may have their own pricing and promotions on the items that sell.

Any pieces that are sold out will likely not return. However, we highly recommend subscribing to our email list here https://julievos.attn.tv/a_gzx5CxWSWl to stay informed about upcoming product releases.

templates.name: How do I register my jewelry?
templates.content: All jewelry purchased is automatically covered under the warranty and registration is not required.

templates.name: What are your return terms for this 2024 Black Friday sale?
templates.content:
We are offering a special holiday return and exchange period this season. For any full-priced items purchased on or after November 1, 2024, you'll have until January 15, 2025, to make a return or exchange. We hope this gives you peace of mind and extra flexibility during the busy holiday season.

If the item was purchased from our Black Friday sale and the item is marked sale or final sale, the item CANNOT be returned or exchanged. If the item is a FULL-PRICED item and a discount code was used, you may return the item per the above return window.

When you're ready, just start your request through our returns portal https://julievos.attn.tv/ahGvRQVnamI2/#/, and we'll provide a prepaid return shipping label to make it simple and convenient for you.

templates.name: Where do you ship to?
templates.content: We ship to P.O boxes and residences only.

templates.name: What is the size of the Hinged Bangle?
templates.content: Al of our Hinged bangles have an 8-inch circumference and 2.5-inch diameter. They are universally sized to fit most wrist sizes!

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.julievos.com/#/?_gl=1*12o7zfz*_gcl_au*OTAzNTU2NjcwLjE3MzU5MzgyNzI.*_ga*MzkzNzExOTEzLjE3MzU5MzgyNzI.*_ga_W99JTC7TVM*MTczNTkzODI3MS4xLjAuMTczNTkzODI3My41OC4wLjEwMjc5Njk0MTc.

templates.name: Where is my birthday code?
templates.content: Our birthday email should be sent out on the day of your birthday and the code will only be valid for one year. Please check your spam and promo folders as sometimes our emails end up there. If you don't receive it on your birthday, please email us at customercare@julievos.com and my team will be happy to help you secure a birthday code!

templates.name: Are your pieces real silver?
templates.content: Our pieces are plated with pure silver over nickel-free brass. They are plated with pure silver and are not sterling silver.

templates.name: How do I redeem my rewards points?
templates.content: Once logged in, you can convert your points to dollars. You'll receive an email with a code to redeem at checkout.

templates.name: Aquitaine Duo Stud measurements
templates.content: The Aquitaine Duo Stud is 0.65 inches in length. The width is approximately 0.4 inches.

templates.name: Do you offer customizations?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't offer customizations. We sell pieces as they are pictured online. I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

templates.name: No discount codes/ promos available
templates.content:
I'm afraid we don't have any codes available at the moment. I'm sorry for the inconvenience. 
However, you can sign up for our email list here https://www.julievos.com/pages/sign-up-for-e-mail-list to be notified of any upcoming sales and promotions.

templates.name: Holiday return policy
templates.content:
For any full-priced items purchased on or after November 1, 2025, you'll have until January 15, 2026, to make a return or exchange. We hope this gives you peace of mind and extra flexibility during the busy holiday season.

When you're ready, just start your request through our returns portal: https://returns.julievos.com/#/ and we'll provide a prepaid return shipping label to make it simple and convenient for you.

templates.name: How can I exchange a gift?
templates.content:
Our exchange and return procedure is designed to be swift, effortless, and simple! To begin the process, click on the provided link to get started: https://julievos.attn.tv/aG-DGQH-OpnD. 
Be sure to process it as a gift exchange, and the purchaser will not be notified.
Once both have been entered, you will be prompted to enter your email and shipping information (please note, if you do not see this as the next step, it is not being processed as a gift exchange, start over).

Once finalized, the return label will be emailed to you.

templates.name: What is the largest ring size you offer?
templates.content: The largest ring size we offer (depending on the style) is size 9, and all of our adjustable rings can accommodate ring sizes up to 9. If you stretch it to a 10, it may cause the ring to break.

templates.name: Can I use both a code and a gift card in one order?
templates.content: You'll be able to stack your Julie Vos gift card with one code - it can be either your birthday discount or your loyalty points. You will not be able to combine your birthday discount and your loyalty points in one order, as we do not allow combining discounts. You may use your birthday discount on one order, then your loyalty points on a future order.

templates.name: How do I view and claim my rewards?
templates.content:
You may redeem your points for a future order using the instructions below.

1. Visit our Rewards Page:
Visit https://julievos.attn.tv/aokyEGgjxKnz
2. Log In or Join:
Once you're on the Rewards page, click the Get Started button, then select Login.
If you already have a Julie Vos account, please log in. If not, click Create account to set up a new account.
3. Scroll to "Redeem Rewards":
Once you're signed in, scroll down the page until you see the Redeem Rewards section. This is where you'll see how many points you have and how much they're worth.
Here's a screenshot to help you spot it easily: https://julievos.attn.tv/aGWnyajnvdTZ

(This image should show the Redeem Rewards section with the slider and redeem button visible.)

4. Choose How Many Points to Use:
Use the slider to pick how many points you'd like to redeem. You'll see how much money you'll save based on your selection.
5. Click "Redeem":
After choosing your points, click the Redeem button. This will generate a unique discount code just for you.
6. Use the Code at Checkout:
At checkout, paste your code into the box that says "Discount code or gift card", then click Apply.
Helpful Tip:
If you ever lose track of your code, no worries! Just go back to the Redeemed tab in the Redeem Rewards section to view it again.
Points expire 12 months after they are earned, but don't worry - we'll send you a reminder ahead of time so you'll have the chance to use them before they expire.
If you run into any trouble at all, don't hesitate to reach back out, we're always happy to help!

templates.name: When does the birthday offer expire?
templates.content: When we send you a birthday promotion, it's good for up to 12 months from the date that it was issued.

templates.name: Do you sell pendants separately?
templates.content: Unfortunately, we do not sell pendants separately. You must purchase multiple necklaces for multiple pendants.

templates.name: Do you offer free returns?
templates.content: We do offer free returns on full priced merchandise. Once you submit your return, we provide a prepaid label for you to send back your pieces.
